content.description: Log level for agent log messages
content.title: LogLevel

AgentState.description:
Global state shared across all agents in the orchestration loop

This state is passed between agents and maintains context about the current conversation, authentication status, and which agent is currently "speaking".

current_speaker.description: Currently active speaker (None means orchestrator decides)

just_finished.description: Whether the current agent just finished its task

thread_id.description: Current thread ID (if in a thread)

ConversationTurn.description: A single turn in a conversation (for context tracking)

role.description: Role of the speaker (user, assistant, system)

forwarded_message.description: Optional message to pass to next agent

should_continue.description: Whether the orchestration loop should continue

content.description: Summary of a thread for list views
content.title: ThreadSummary

content.description: A request to invoke a tool

arguments.description: Arguments to pass to the tool

call_id.description: Unique ID for this tool call

tool_name.description: Name of the tool to invoke

content.title: ToolCallRequest

AgentMessageType.description:
Agent message types for different response formats

The agentic system can produce various types of responses depending on what the agent is doing. This enum captures all possible message types.

oneOf.description: A log message from the agent (debugging, status updates)
A question the agent is asking the user
An insight derived by the agent
A command/action the agent wants to execute

Finding.description: A finding from an analysis agent

title.description: Title or label of the finding

LogLevel.description: Log level for agent log messages

content.description: A single message within a conversation thread

agent_speaker.description: Which agent sent this message (if role is Assistant)

thread_id.description: ID of the thread this message belongs to

content.title: ThreadMessage

is_first_message.description: Whether this is the first message in a conversation

Finding.description: A finding from an analysis agent

title.description: Title or label of the finding

WeaveBlock.description: Input block types for multimodal weave requests

extract_images.description: Whether to extract images from the page

selector.description: Optional CSS selector to extract specific content

content.description:
Commands that can be sent to the agentic system

These commands are the primary interface for interacting with the multi-agent orchestration system. They can be sent directly via HTTP or published to a message broker.

oneOf.description: Send a new message to the agentic system
Continue processing in an existing thread

thread_id.description: ID of the thread to continue

task_id.description: ID of the task to cancel

limit.description: Maximum number of messages to return

content.title: AgenticCommand

AgentMessageType.description:
Agent message types for different response formats

The agentic system can produce various types of responses depending on what the agent is doing. This enum captures all possible message types.

oneOf.description: A log message from the agent (debugging, status updates)
A question the agent is asking the user
An insight derived by the agent
A command/action the agent wants to execute

Finding.description: A finding from an analysis agent

title.description: Title or label of the finding

LogLevel.description: Log level for agent log messages

ThreadMessage.description: A single message within a conversation thread

agent_speaker.description: Which agent sent this message (if role is Assistant)

thread_id.description: ID of the thread this message belongs to

content.description:
A conversation thread (Slack-like linear threading)

Each thread starts with a user message and contains all responses and follow-up messages in a linear sequence.

is_open.description: Whether the thread is still active/open

messages.description: All messages in the thread (in chronological order)

parent_message_id.description: ID of the original user message that started the thread

summary.description: Summary of the thread (for display in lists)

updated_at.description: When the thread was last updated

content.title: ConversationThread

content.description: A finding from an analysis agent

title.description: Title or label of the finding

content.title: Finding

content.description:
Events emitted by the agentic system

These events notify clients about state changes and results from the multi-agent system. They can be delivered via WebSocket, SSE, or consumed from a message broker.
content.title: AgenticEvent

content.description:
Speaker/agent identifiers for the orchestration system

Each speaker is a specialized agent that handles specific types of tasks. The orchestrator routes to the appropriate speaker based on user intent.

oneOf.description: Main user-facing agent - greets users, explains capabilities
Classification agent - determines entity types, message intent
Physics simulation agent - handles VAE space calculations

content.title: AgentSpeaker

content.description: Full physics state for an entity
content.title: PhysicsState
